permissions.title: Enable device location
permissions.description: We use your location to show you nearby locations and to help you find the best places.

take_a_ticket.title: Get a Ticket
take_a_ticket.description: Take advantage of your waiting time in lines for productive things.

get_turnly.title: You + Turnly = Top match!
get_turnly.description: Provide the best customer experience for your visitors.

labels.search_no_results: Oops, we couldn't find any locations!

services.title: Info
services.description: Find the best services in your location.

labels.hint: What service do you want to receive?
labels.services_not_found: This location doesnâ€™t have services available, so it is not possible to continue ticket-taking.

fields.title: Info
fields.description: Take a ticket to the selected location.

notifications.preference: How do you prefer to receive notifications?
notifications.preference_phone: Phone number where we will send?
notifications.no_preference: If you donâ€™t choose an option to send notifications, it will be hard to keep track of changes to your ticket.

leave_confirmation.title: Youâ€™re sure?
leave_confirmation.description: If you get out of line you will lose your turn, you can always take a ticket again in the same location or in others.

created.title: Ahoy, youâ€™re in line!
created.description: Take advantage of your waiting time for productive things. Youâ€™re already in line!

served.title: Ahoy, youâ€™re served!
served.description: Thanks for using our service, we hope to see you again soon. Remember that you can always leave us a comment about your experience.

announce.title: Announce your arrival
announce.description: Let the people behind of you know that you are here. You will be called shortly.

arrived.title: Welcome to {{organization}}
arrived.description: Wait while the people ahead of you advance. You will be called shortly.

you_are_next.title: Connecting to agent...
you_are_next.description: Ready for a perfect experience? Pending we will almost call you...

called.title: Theyâ€™re calling you right now!
called.description: Itâ€™s time to meet our agent at the {{desk}}

rating.title: How was your experience with the location?

cancelled.description: Oops, we're sorry to notice you that this ticket is no longer active, you may not have shown up when called. For more info, contact us.

errors.network: Oops, we couldn't connect to the server, please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.not_found: Oops, we couldn't find any results for your search.
errors.client: Oops, we couldn't connect to the server, please try again later.

close_widget.title: Are you sure?
close_widget.description: If you close the widget, you'll lose the information you entered and if you have a ticket, you'll be left from the line and have to start over.

notifications.permission: We'd like to send you notifications to keep you updated, we will ask you for permission in 3 seconds if you don't mind. Catch you later!
notifications.ticket_before_yours_updated: The number of people ahead of you has changed, you are now waiting for {{beforeYours}} people.
notifications.ticket_called_to_desk: You are now being called to the desk!
notifications.ticket_served: Ahoy, youâ€™re served. We hope to see you again soon. Remember that you can always leave us a comment about your experience.
